sqlMap.select: SELECT CATEGORY_CD FROM CATEGORY_MST WHERE CATEGORY_ABBREV IS NOT NULL ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER
SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CD FROM ITEM_MST WHERE CATEGORY_CD = #categoryCd# AND DELETE_FG IS NULL AND NO_USE_FG IS NULL ORDER BY ITEM_CD
SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY_MST WHERE CATEGORY_CD = #categoryCd# AND CATEGORY_ABBREV IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CD = #itemCd# AND CATEGORY_CD = #categoryCd# AND DELETE_FG IS NULL AND NO_USE_FG IS NULL

SELECT DTL.CATEGORY_CD AS categoryCd, DTL.ITEM_CD AS itemCd, DTL.LINK_TO_IMAGE AS linkToImage, DTL.IMAGE_NAME AS imageName, DTL.IMAGE_SIZE AS imageSize, DTL.LINK_TO_PDF AS linkToPdf, DTL.PDF_NAME AS pdfName, DTL.PDF_SIZE AS pdfSize, DTL.REMARK as remark, CATE.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, ITEM.ITEM_NAME AS itemName FROM ITEM_DTL_MST DTL LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_MST CATE ON DTL.CATEGORY_CD = CATE.CATEGORY_CD LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CD, ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM_MST) ITEM ON DTL.ITEM_CD = ITEM.ITEM_CD WHERE DTL.ITEM_CD = #itemCd# AND DTL.CATEGORY_CD = #categoryCd#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ITEM_DTL_MST SET LINK_TO_IMAGE = #linkToImage#, IMAGE_NAME = #imageName#, IMAGE_SIZE = #imageSize#, LINK_TO_PDF = #linkToPdf#, PDF_NAME = #pdfName#, PDF_SIZE = #pdfSize#, REMARK = #remark#, UPDATED_USER = #updatedUser#, UPDATED_DT_UTC = SYSDATE - #timeDifference#/24, UPDATED_DT_SERVER = SYSDATE, UPDATED_DT_LOCAL = #updatedDtLocal#, EXCLUSIVE_FG = #exclusiveFg# WHERE ITEM_CD = #itemCd# AND CATEGORY_CD = #categoryCd#

UPDATE ITEM_MST SET DELETE_FG = '1', UPDATED_USER = #updatedUser#, UPDATED_DT_UTC = SYSDATE - #timeDifference#/24, UPDATED_DT_SERVER = SYSDATE, UPDATED_DT_LOCAL = #updatedDtLocal#, EXCLUSIVE_FG = #exclusiveFg# WHERE ITEM_CD = #itemCd#
